description: We are here to provide you with a safe and calming space. Explore our resources to find support.
footer: You are not alone. Together we move forward.
chatDescription: Get instant support through our chat system.
groupsDescription: Join groups with shared experiences for support.
followUpDescription: Continue your journey with regular follow-up sessions.
resourcesDescription: Access inspirational and helpful videos for support.
doctorsDescription: Find expert medical professionals to assist you.
assistanceDescription: Get help with various personal and emotional challenges.
callDescription: Speak with an AI for immediate support.
